name: Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit Bonus Edition
description: Feel the rush of the escape or the thrill of the takedown! Outrun the law or stop racers cold in up to 8 supercars like the Pagani Zonda Cinque and the Lamborghini Gallardo LP 560-4 Spyder across 24 day-and-night tracks. Earn Bounty to upgrade your ride â€“ buy bonuses to get the upper hand. Bring the heat with Need for Speed Hot Pursuit Bonus edition!
